# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) 

### Power generation structure at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt structure at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Inserter structure at position(39.5, -79.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(114.5, -28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group structure at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them.
-  Check the status of the burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
-  Check the status of the entities to ensure they are not out of ingredients.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engines are connected to a power source before using them.
-  Check the status of the steam engines to ensure they are connected.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that the pipe groups have fluid before using them.
-  Check the status of the pipe groups to ensure they are not empty.

### Errors when using electricity groups without connection to electric network
-  Ensure that the electricity groups are connected to an electric network before using them.
-  Check the status of the electricity groups to ensure they are plugged in.

### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Ensure that the belt groups have items before using them.
-  Check the status of the belt groups to ensure they are not empty.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
